title: Photos: Bigelow Hollow In Union
text:
Caption Bigelow Hollow State Park Peter Marteka / Hartford Courant A rope swing blows in the wind across Mashapaug Pond at Bigelow Hollow State Park.
A rope swing blows in the wind across Mashapaug Pond at Bigelow Hollow State Park.
(Peter Marteka / Hartford Bigelow Hollow State Park Peter Marteka / Hartford Courant Colorful leaves collect along the banks of Mashapaug Pond at Bigelow Hollow State Park in Union.
Colorful leaves collect along the banks of Mashapaug Pond at Bigelow Hollow State Park in Union.
